price: በምድርም ላይ የተንበጣረረክ ሆነህ፤ አትሂድ፡፡ አንተ ፈጽሞ ምድርን አትሰረጉድምና በርዝመትም ፈጽሞ ጋራዎችን አትደርስምና፡፡
arabic: وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّكَ لَن تَخۡرِقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَلَن تَبۡلُغَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ طُولٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tamshi fī al-arḍi maraḥan innaka lan takhriqa al-arḍa walan tablugha al-jibāla ṭūlan
